content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in back yard facing west.
a helocoptor flys by south to north.
2 minutes later i face west i notice a bright white fireball with pulsating spikes & bright white tail moving east to west. it stated at an even straight line then disappeared . it seemed to last for about 3 seconds.
before the sighting i was relaxed and about ready to pee outside in my back yard.
during the sighting i was hollering for my son & nefew to come out and look! i felt excited & perplexed. 
after the sighting my heartbeat & speech was faster than normal.
i lost sight of the object when it disappeared.
content.summary: Bright white orb with pulsating spikes leaving a bright white trail. moving east to west then disappeared .

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were standing on our porch, looking up at the sky for northern lights. when all of a sudden, we looked out towards the end of the runway of the airport. the airport is on an island with woods surrounding it. about 1/10th of a mile from the end of the runway, back in the woods, we saw a starlike object rise above the trees and, ascend into the sky. it was moving at medium speed, and we knew it wasn't a helicopter or any kind of human aircraft. the object kept going up and up until it stopped, about 500-1,000 feet in the air. when it stopped, it looked exactly like a star, and the clouds covered it and i didn't see it again. 3 minutes later an alaska airlines jet landed. about 5 hours later, we saw the same thing, but it was more towards the middle of the runway. it had gotten cloudy so i did not see the object stop, as the clouds were blocking my view. i have no explanation for this!
content.summary: Starlike object ascended straight up from forest, kept going higher until it stopped, and looked like a star.

content.detailedDescription: Dropped off passengerand noticed odd bright yellow orange lights hoovering in the sky to the north.  viewed and noticed several more appeared, total of 5.  they did not all move in the same direction, some stayed fixed in position.  some went very dim and then came back very bright.  total of 4 witnesses observed this.  driver became anxious and demanded to get going home.  several snapshots from phone camera taken.  pictures from phone camera show more detail however show a very difrent color than observed.  the objects appear very difrent when we zoom in on the pictures
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 yellow orange bright lights pulsating.  much larger and much brighter than stars or aircraft lights.  some moved at difrent times with out the others.  some disapeared and reapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was stood having a cigarette at my front door, i thought i saw a wisp of smoke from my cigarette but i realised it was a vey dark shape moving very fast and difficult to see until it passed bellow a cloud, it was at around 12 30 to 12 50 on the 1st january 2015, i shouted others in my house to come see and my sons girlfriend just caught a glimpse of it as it went out of sight over a neighbours roof line, the object was very dark, made no noise, it must have been going at some speed, it was shaped like a triangle with the back 2 corners cut of, similar to a diamond shape
content.summary: It flew very fast overhead no noise

content.detailedDescription: In 2012 i was abducted. same year my daughter captures ufo from moving car using her camera. i have been visited on numerous occassions but this recent picture just makes more thing interesting. i feel the greys presence sometimes with strange orbs appearing and dreams of abduction. here are the pics i have..
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription: On dec. 22, 2014, myself and one other person observed three orange orbs in the southern sky. it was about 8:20 p.M. cst. i ran in to get the camera, and when i returned was able to photograph two of the orbs before they blinked out. i switched my camera to video mode, but didn't think it was able to record the activity. later discovered that it did record one of the orange orbs blink on and then off after making a semi-circular pattern. a few seconds later, a small white light can be seen in the lower right area of the screen appear in view. it traveled a very fast, jagged path to about the center of the screen, then disappeared.
content.summary: Bright orange orbs in the southern sky. then secondary small, white light made jagged pattern.

content.detailedDescription: This object was about half a mile from my viewing position it was changing shape from ball to saucer at one point it moved from one point in the sky to another could not move my camcorder fast enough to keep up with our sent my video to a,local investigator mapit based in manchester uk they estimated it was at a,height of between 500 /600 and 50 ft to 60 ft wide stationery hanging in the sky .Since the sighting after transferring it to a,dvd disc i have been able to improve the images by zooming in and use of filters you can see,a saucer moving across the sky with what looks,like,some,form of cloaking device i have put  these videos on youtube at ufos over offerton stockport cheshire uk by me peter madden
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sat watching tv my attention was drawn to a doughnut contrail thought that strange started to record onmy camcorder a object biack in colour seemed  to be morphing  from ball to saucer shape atone point just above the tree one came from below morphed

content.detailedDescription:
on dec 27, 2014, i was travelling on i-70 east from a friend’s house in columbia, maryland, around 4 pm. i saw something large and white in the sky perhaps just about one or two miles straight ahead of me. (i was about to merge onto the baltimore beltway.) the object didn’t appear to be moving. instead, it hovered not far above some buildings/residences. i saw no exhaust coming from the object. it bears mentioning, though, that there were more vapor trails in the sky that day that i can ever remember seeing--and i'm an air force brat!

i don't think the object was a dirigible, given its shape. all i know is that i have absolutely no doubt that there was something in the sky on dec 27. my hope is that the “something” can be easily explained!
content.summary: Large white object spotted hovering over maryland neighborhood

content.detailedDescription:
Biking down 27th ave, i noticed a glowing globe in front of me.  it seemed to get brighter, and i watched it to see if there were blinking lights like an airplane, but there were none.  just glowing reddish orange.  it seemed like if it was an airplane this close, it would have to move faster than it was in order to stay airborne. 
so i watched it as well as i could, but an airplane entered my vision to the right and i looked at that, and noticed that it was much dimmer than the object.  this was only a few seconds, and when i looked back at the object, it was gone.  i stared at the area for a while expectingt it to return, but it did not.  if it was anything like a conventional aircraft, it should have reapeared with lights, due to the high air traffic area and international airport just a few miles away.
i did feel as if i were drawn to it, but only because it seemed odd, and i have seen a few other oddities and am generally interested in ufo activity.   no lost time or anything.
content.summary: Glowing orange red ball.  moving very slow.  no noise.  i think if it were a helicopter, i would have heard it at this distance

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my patio having my morning cigarette and i saw a light coming from the west so i watched it and at first i thought it was an airplane but i realized the light's weren't red and green, they were bright orange and a pale yellow or white,and the size was so big... it was way up in the sky but i could see that it was huge,and it was shaped like a triangle but the corner's were rounded.It had pale yellow light's on the edge and had blinking bright orange light's in the center.I watched it and waited to hear a noise but it didn't make a sound.I was scared and amazed at the same time then i ran in and messaged my daughter to call me and she sent me the link to you.I should have made a drawing of it and sent it with this but i'm not any good at drawing.
content.summary: I went outside to have a cigarette at 6:53 and a light caught my eye,i stood and watched it for a few minutes and ran in side to call my daughter.

content.detailedDescription:
We are a god fearing christian family and we went to chikhaldara (hill station spot) in 21-23 oct 2014 for family trip. on 21st we were talking @ ufo and aliens and one new beleiver didnt seem to agree. on 22nd we went to a point called 'pancahabol' which is a range of mountains and we can hear a echo 5 times. here we shouted the word 'hallelujha' several times and enjoyed the echo; before moving out of that point we asked the local photographer to take a family snap and when we developed the photo we observed this strange object in backdrop which when zoomed looks like a ufo. when we enquired about the spot we discovered that more than 30 suicides have taken place on this spot and nobody have ever encountered the ufo earlier here. when the event occured; the new beleiver was shocked and we all praised god.
to leave us a memory; we thought to take a photo of a new beleiver(in colourful shirt) and the local photographer (in white shirt) together in front of the name and description of spot (in marathi; local language)
content.summary: It was a coincidence that we asked photographer to take family photo and when developed we found the ufo in backdrop.

content.detailedDescription: I was 13 years old just before christmas my mother wanted to mail a card to a friend at the post office here. my mother went into the post office to drop in the card and i noticed a ring of lights very close to the ground in the intersection lees than 75 feet from the car it covered up the view of a old farm house and power went out from what i can remember in the area near craft. it may have been coming closer to the car from what i can remember?  seem to take a long time for my mom to return to the car...I then pointed it out to her...I was very very frightened by the experience. my mother and my brother and i seen this together but my brother is in denial on it for some reason? ever since it happened i have been interested in the issue of ufos and have a strong feeling they do actually exists without doubt. just thought after all this time it needed to be reported. thanks. [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Round object with outer ring of lights hovering less than 75 feet from us may have been getting closer?

content.detailedDescription:
We were an expat family living in kuwait.
i was 8 years old. my brother was 10.
we were coming home from our local mosque from the early morning al-fajr prayers at around 5am. (yes kuwait was a lovely safe place in the 80's and you could let kids go to the local mosque to pray at that time)

pitch black outside, i often gazed up at the star filled skyies as we walked home.
on this occasion i was gazing up at an angle of about 45 degrees above the horizon.
i had seen quite a few objects in the clear kuwait night skies in the 80's
i had seen massive fireballs, and shooting stars so was familiar with celestial objects

this however was very different.

suddenly a star like object appeared (electric blue in colour), shot down at an angle of about 45 degrees, it flashed brightly at the point of its direction change, and then it shot an at upward angle of 160 degree angle. moving in the shape of a tick. the change of direction and the angle of change was sharp.

it lasted for less than a second. appeared out of nowhere flashed brightly, electric blue at the point it change direction sharply, and flicked up, and dissapeared.
it was gone as quickly as it had appeared, within a second.

i looked at my brother, and said did you see that? he did see it.

that simple event that i couldn't explain transformed my world view.
i was very familiar, even at 8, with shooting stars moving in straight lines. i had seen a massive fireball flying over the horizon over my head in kuwait, and dissapear in the distance. all those however i would describe as organic natural events.

this however was very different, no organic natural object could change direction like this light i saw that night, it appeared out of nowhere, flashed brightly as it changed direction and dissapeared. mind blowing seeing such a thing at 8 years old, because i know that no known human technology or indeed natural objects can move like that.
content.summary: Bright light moving super fast changed direction at a sharp angle

content.detailedDescription:
Mrs carolyn mam.....

i have been studying the crystal mountain over next to the palomar volcano certain yanquis are trying to deny exists and call it a "mountain".

the west side of the fault line that forms the mesa grande mountain ridge is entirely crystal in contrast to the dolorite granite of the palomar volcano, we call volcan de paloma.

our company places energy and water generating geothermal plants over such active sites and i have been tasked with determining if one of the 9 native american tribes can handle such an operation on their land in order to provide their own electrical power to run these massive casinos they have built over here in calif......

they are arguing about casino royalties in this new epidemic program or i should say problem termed "dis-enrollment" where those with more than 50% native american bloodlines are kicking out those with less in order to receive far more tax free casino dole and it may come to a war on more than one reservation because the california casinos made more than all of las vegas combined over the past couple years.

so i decided to go visit arizona and did not find out you had one of the crystal skulls until i had returned from 8 days geology survey there.....I was left under the impression you are located in sedona....Maybe mistaken...

we are well aware that these ancient artifacts do contain stored knowledge and possibly us floundering humans will be able to find out how to connect to it, hopefully in the near future. even back when we were living in alta verapaz guatemala in the 1970's we were informed of the crystal skulls and their amazing properties.

all i can say about this particular location in southern calif that respected astronomer george adamski documented in 1952 and 1953, is that the area remains some kind of draw or location for visits from other life forms and one of the most interesting aspects is the mining under the volcano going on at night.....

after working on it for several months, i ran into two local tribal members, mikaela kolb from the rincon reservation and her boyfriend kyle from the la jolla reservation, who both swore there are underground explosions at night....I was skeptial of this story until it happened while i was on the south grade of the volcano on july 20th during an amazing sunset when i was at 3000 ft, the mountain belched and released energy that blasted up thru and made the clouds overhead look like fish vertabrae...This took place about 8;30 pm and i did not notice the evidence until i moved the photos i was taking over to my laptop......

i have collected thousands of rocks that have been blasted off from underneath like popcorn, that are not normal geological activity. some of them i find kilometers from where they were part of the volcano....

so i moved up to the same location that was paradise gardens in the 1950's that is oak knoll now and when i was wide awake watching the stars on sept 16th, an apache helicopter came roaring up the valley from the south at 10:00 pm and it was perfectly clear enough to see it at about 3000 ft or so and it was chasing this speeding ball of light energy, that playfully stalled in mid flight as if to let the copter catch up, and then it sped off at supersonic speed without making a sound in a directly level horizontal flight path to the north, leaving the copter far behind.....

so if you are aware of any mineral connection to all of this, maybe we can discuss it with some who are while i am here from indonesia....I will make another trip over to arizona in order to spend a bit more time and if possible would like to meet and hear your experiences with this amazing mineral and how it has been used thru the centuries in the object you have.

thank you for your consideration and enjoy the holidays...

respectfully & truthfully yours
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing ufo being chased by military helicopter slowing to a hover then bolting off at supersonic speed

content.detailedDescription: Woke up at 4:30 am, noticed what appeared to be a star.  watched it slowly descend while while even more slowly veering to the right (south).  it eventually disappeared at the treeline.  just before that one went out of sight i saw the exact same type a bit more to the left (more toward the east),  this one was ascending from above the treeline.  it continues rising and slowly moving east until it was out of my sight.  i was watching it from my couch through the window.
content.summary: Star like/slow descent

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were sky watching on the 29th. our vantage point was looking to the south coast from the big sur mountains. i happened to look up and see a huge glowing fireball like object streaking down across the sky. we both saw it for about 10 seconds. it was a green/blueish white light, we watched it go all the way down the coast and out of sight. it looked different from other shooting stars/ fireballs we've seen here. i couldn't see any tail coming off of it. i saw another case reported it here on mufon the same night in ca: case number 62239. it was almost definitely the same object the other people saw. i also thought it might crash or we would see a flash of light or something. but it just disappeared to the south. it seemed it was descending but not straight down like the other report saw. it seemed to be very slowly coming down or even staying level. could not get the camera out intime to get a pic. we dont know what it was, it was quite a sight to see though. and we see many strange things in the sky here and this was a new one. we also see strange flashes of light and orbs here regularly. i have also filed one report on here regarding some of the orbs with photographic evidence a couple years ago.
content.summary: Big fireball like object flew down central coast

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
please be advised that i do not remember the exact date. but this event was reported. the police came. 3 army helicopters appeared. and me and my son were both questioned and taped by an official investigator within that week. there were other sightings in rhode island that week that were also in the local paper.
i was outside in my back yard with my two children. son(5)daughter(3). i was swinging them on the swing set when i first noticed the object. it was quite far in the distance, just a black dot. (planes flew over our house often, so at first i thought nothing of it. but what caught my attention was how it suddenly moved way off to the side at a strange angle. but it still kept coming closer in my direction. i continued watching and realized then...This was unidentifiable. it moved like nothing we have here, and as it got closer i realized just how *huge* it was. bigger then 2 football fields. it was massive. it appeared to have what i think was windows all around its circular edge. it was round,rather flat shaped with a very, very slight dome shape on top. it's speed at that time was consistent and not too fast. i could see it perfectly. as did my children. i'm not good with distance but i would say it came within a 1/2 mile to us. it moved impossibly amazing. it dipped at an angle and changed direction. it flew into the cloud and back out. flew 'around' the cloud and at an angle back towards us. it hovered. it went up/down/sideways. it reflected the sun on it's top/bottom as it moved. it almost appeared to be giving a show! i was screaming for my neighbors to come out. but "strangely" i was not fearful at all. i was beside myself with excitement actually! i did not want to move or go to get anyone because i didn't want to miss any of what i was seeing. the object kept up the display above me for about 10 full minutes when suddenly i heard helicopters. three green(army) helicopters came into view from my left. the object dipped and dove down at an angle and then up to the right in the blink of a second______it was gone!!  
i ran into the house and called the police- because i didn't know what else to do. i then went back outside and the army copters were still flying (back and forth). they saw it. i am certain of this. the police came and i reported what i had seen. the officers took it comically and i was angered by them. they also went around and questioned the neighbors. at this point- and i have no idea if this is even relevant- (but it sure was to me),the old woman who lived in back of me, (our yards were back to back separated by a stone wall)she came out and called me over wanting to know what was happening. i just told her i had called because i saw something strange in the sky. she then looked at me and said * oh' you mean about all those colored lights in the yard last night?!"* i went numb. this woman knew everything that went on. i said "what colored lights?" she then said that [the lights woke her and she went to her back door and there were all these colored lights moving over the back yard. she went and woke her husband who saw them too. they opened the door to go out but the lights suddenly were gone.]i called one of the officers over to take her statement too! __ about a week later i was visited by a gentlemen from the rhode island institute of paranormal and ufo investigations. he audio taped my account and my sons account seperately. (my daughter was too young). he also had us draw pictures for him. 
this account was reported and documented. there were also other sightings within that week that were reported and in the local paper. one of them which happen only 3 days from mine in which two young men in exeter had an object come down extremely close to them in their truck. it (melted) the fog lights on the truck.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: It was round, almost flat (like a quarter) with what appeared to be windows all around it's edge. it was metalic, it was impossibly fast, it was huge!

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were driving on hwy 285 in colorado on are way to some hot springs for vacation.The surrounding area was very beautiful so she decided take some pictures. as she was she noticed an object on the screen she started to try to find it without using the phone and was asking if i could see anything.When she realized she could only see it through the camera screen on the phone she quickly took a couple pictures of it. neither of us ever did see anything with our naked eyes, but in the photos it appears add if the object wad traveling vary fast, we were going about 65 mph and the pictures were taken only a few seconds apart yet threw object appears to have moved drastically. we cannot identify this and are hoping someone else can.
content.summary: Caught something with camera phone that couldn't see with naked eye

content.detailedDescription:
My sighting took place the night of december 25, 2014 at approximately 9:00pm. the night was clear and about -5c.  there was no other traffic on the road when i was there.

the sighting took place as i was approaching my condo in turner valley, ab on imperial drive and about 1 kilometer east of the house.
i was driving west about ½ kilometer from a cross street which has the orange vapor street lights.  i noticed two lights somewhat higher  in the sky which i assumed were other street lights.  but then i noticed they were moving in an eastward direction towards me. they were of a similar colour as the street lights which made me think initially that they were other street lights.
i pulled over beside the road and watched them approach. it was obvious by then that there was two of them fairly close together. as they came almost overhead one turned and headed in a southeast direction while the other one maintained an easterly direction.  the lights began fading and after approximately 30 seconds both disappeared completely.

as it was very dark i wasn’t able to identify any details about the objects other than the lights.  as they passed overhead i listened out the car window but did not hear a sound.
content.summary: Viewed two orange lights travelling slowly together eastward then separated and headed east and southeast

content.detailedDescription: As i stepped outside to get some air, i noticed 2 objects gliding in a hovering manner with, bright orange lights, as low as the tree line. it was as if these crafts were gliding to the nw from the east. and then within an instance,  1 made the most incredible acceleration to the sky straight forward,  and the other made a aeronautical move to the sw,. and then 2 more right behind them. as a spiritual man,  haven't slept right since.  i had a witness,  i fumbled my phone trying to capture,  most amazing thing i've ever seen,. i am now a true believer. .
content.summary: Watched a total of 4 crafts, with bright orange like lights, with no so sound, glide right in front of me and my gf. they took off in 2 separate directions as if i were watching star trek, in real life.

content.detailedDescription:
While crossing dam to u.S. side noticed large glowing white sphere hovering about 75 ft. above the discharge side of power dam. about 200 to 300 hundred yards away. dam has many transformers on that side of building. went to u.S. security station and we watched it with security cameras for about 10-15 minutes. at that time sphere very rapidly (zoomed) away.
sphere appeared to be about 100 ft. in diameter. at first glance thought it was the moon. but it was too close and had no shadowing like the moon and had objects in the back ground hidden by it. it glowed a white glow - very bright.
content.summary: Round sphere about 100 ft wide, glowing white about 200/300 yards from power dam, hovering

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was playing disc golf with my friends we noticed a police helicopter just flying over our area which caused us to look up. we noticed a black object square shaped with what looked like a single wing or propeller of some sort on the left side. as soon as i seen the object i immediately removed my cell phone and was fortunate to capture the event. 
i continued my game as my friends tried convincing me that it was just a weather balloon. i watched the object disappear into the clouds. the object came from the north and flew directly over our heads less than a thousand feet from the ground. it was intense.As soon as i noticed the awkwardness in shape and color and size i knew it was out of the ordinary. i was excited because i am intrigued by this sort of thing. i feel lucky to have the moment on camera and would love for this experience to be confirmed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Seen helicopter observing object where myself and a few others witnessed object

content.detailedDescription:
The night of tuesday, sept. 30, 2014 was a dark, cloudy night. it had been raining most of the day. there were two dark areas out over the gulf with an open, less dark area in between. at the time of this event at 10:30 pm, it was not raining. the moon was obscured behind the clouds.
i was walking on the beach at indian rocks with a friend, a second witness. the witness observed a dark area to the nw over the water and felt uncomfortable. i asked my friend to describe what they sensed. " a metallic object fighting with nature out over the gulf." my friend spoke out loud and addressed the area.
within 2 - 3 minutes, i saw an object appear in my vision from the nw area. sudden motion draws my attention. i called out to my friend, "look!" and pointed at the object. my friend watched with me as the object moved south very quickly and disappeared. 
it appeared to be approx. 500 ft. out, oval in shape, whitish/gray, glowing with a dull brightness, about 20 ft. above the water, looking about two inches wide at arms length, paralleling the shoreline traveling about 1,000 ft. before disappearing.
the witness saw the object i saw as well as a matching object farther out apparently paralleling the closer object. 
i felt shocked at first and then a feeling of exhilaration at the possibilities of what we had witnessed.
content.summary: Walking n on indian rocks bch. 10:30 pm. observed transluscent/white/grayish light , oval shape appear over the water to the nw & move quickly to the sw at approx. 20 ft. over the water. 8-10 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: [case # removed/cms/dmr]traveling home south on i75 approaching findlay ohio...A bright, very bright star like thing was seen by me and i woke my husband toblook also as i was driving...The closer we got to the star like thing the more we could see the same color pulsating lights coming from the corners of the triangle shape...One point was green. one was red-orange and the main one was white...The red-orange and green lights bleeped or blinked back and forth and the white one was steady and much brighter than the other 2...It was hovering, stationary in the sky because it stayed where we 1st seen it and it was like we drove to it and it just sat in the sky...As we passed underneath we could see it had all the same characteristics as the one ibreported to y'all on november 5/6th 2014...The november sighting was also while on i75, only about 40miles north of where it was tonight...The nov. sighting also was a lot closer as we could see all the details of the actual triangle that time...Tonight it was farther up in the sky...I'd swear on it that it was the same thing.  on 4 other occasions between the 1st nov. sighting and tonight, i seen strange lights in the sky in the same 40 mile span of i75...There's something in the sky out here...It's like nothing we have ever seen and because i am driving i don't have the chance to video or snap pictures of it. my hubby is a car sleeper so upon waking him he isn't quick enough to get his cell going before we have driven by it...I am without a doubt-positively sure 100% that these are ufos in the nw ohio sky between the findlay-bowling green-toledo area! my case# was 61310, i received a call but had lost my cell with return # and voicemail from joe. please call me back...As i know you will be able to find this in the sky...I have seen it twice close enough to report something other than a strange bright light...If you luve close to this area...Look up cuz you're missing out! it's a definite wow occasion! i'd like nothing more than to be stationary myself and capture this on video for all of us!
content.summary: Observed the same object almost 2 months later 40miles south

content.detailedDescription:
Giant white/blue fireball asteroid like falling in a straight downward trajectory from the sky, disappeared behind a hill but no sign of impact seen

12–29–14 at approximately 19:20pm (not exact on the time) in the los angeles county area - city of diamond bar / brea - california.

object was visualized by two witnesses in the same car (retired police officer and a health care provider)- for about 4 to 5 seconds while driving south bound on the 57 freeway, right where it crosses the 60 freeway.  the object was seen from this spot, but appeared to be located approximately a mile or so ahead in the sky flying in a west to south–east trajectory in a downward crashing angle. the object appeared to be a giant shooting star at first traveling very very fast. the fireball heading the asteroid(star) was bright and had a bluish hue to it. appeared to be about to crash around the area on the map with the green shading called: firestone scout reservation (19001 tonner canyon road, brea, ca 92821).
it disappeared from our vision behind the silhouette of a hill.
we expected to hear a loud crash, explosion, see flames or feel the impact of the object crashing but there was no sign of fire/smoke/explosion or noise.

neither witness was intoxicated or under the effects of any drugs/alcohol
content.summary: Giant white/blue fireball asteroid like falling in a straight downward trajectory from the sky, disappeared behind a hill but no sign of impact seen

content.detailedDescription:
It was a cold winter night my sister and i were heading out from our house to the dump hole to throw away a "slop pail" they used to call it.
from the house to dump hole was about 100yrds.We were half ways when she looked up and said what is that?I looked up and this is what i seen!A v shaped object flying real slow no sound and red lights from tip to tip we stood watching it fly east ward for a few minutes then my sister said i never seen a plane that close before but that was very slow though that was strange .So that was that,i was about 10 yrs old when that happened.8 or 9 yrs later my brother and a friend of mine went out night hunting just north of my home.It was about 11pm ,we were spot lighting in very big paster that is situated on our reserve.We drove slow along a trail, a little more south of the paster.I was driving a small station wagon my brother and my friend were sitting out of the windows with a spot light and a rifle.We drove almost to end of the paster when over the trees a bright light came on and brightned up the whole field.My brother and friend slipped back in to the vehicle and said "what the hell is that"i stopped the vehicle and my brother said shut off the motor!We sat for a few seconds and light came back on over the trees cause it had shut off too when i shut my motor off.My brother said what is that?It"s too quite to be a helecopter.He said let"s get out of here!I started up the swagon
 and turned around and headed back where we came from.As we were driving away my friend said it"s following us and all of a sudden it flew right by us on the south side over the trees.My brother then told me to pull in this one opening in trees it was kind of a hill and said shut off the motor.We parked and we could see the thing in the sky.It was a ways out but we seen it go up, go down, go left then flew away north.And also another iccident about 10 yrs ago with 5 witnesses i am 46yrs old
content.summary: V shaped object red lights from tip to tip to tip no sound flying real slow

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dogs in the fair grounds just made it half way around when i look in the sky to gaze upon the stars, i see 4 orbs, brighter than the stars. a triangle figure shape with an orb in the middle,this thing turned left and right   and than the point takes off  goes north than south east and finally comes back to its point in the formation. 10 mins after all that i finished the walk and went home. it wont b the last time either
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fair ground

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out of the door of my house and observed a very large, black, rectangular shaped object sitting stationary in the sky with a what looked like the tail section of a airplane but straight up and down and not slanted as in a airplane.  at first it appeared to be moving toward me above the two story building about a block away, above all overhead wires.  it made no sound.  it began to sort of bounce up and down and stayed still.  i backed up not taking my eyes off of it and reached into my house and grabbed my binoculars near the entrance of my house and took another look with the binoculars and the surface seemed to have ridges on it.  the shape was the same.  after about 2 or 3 minutes it began to move in a northerly direction and seemed to float downward until it was out of sight.  i was alone so i don't know if anyone else saw it.  it seemed solid metal and had no lights.   it was about 5:15 to 5:20pm and the sun was going down but it was still light.  i could not believe my eyes.  i wondered if it was a kite, it was not aerodynamic in anyway that i could imagine.  i was a flight attendant for nearly 25 years for an international airline and have never seen such a sight in all of my flying years.  it seemed like a heard a clicking sound before i stepped out of my house and it was very noticeable when i opened the door because it always look up into sky when i go out.  i was very excited to see such a sight and happy because, i always wanted to see a ufo.
content.summary: Black, rectangular, with a aircraft straight up and down taillike structure on front end

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1:18am on november 30, 2014, from my balcony halfway up the mountain in puerto vallarta, i observed a very, very slow moving boomerang shaped object with square lights/windows symmetrically placed on the inside edge that were white and evenly/equally spaced. i had been looking straight up into the very clear heavens at constellations when this slow moving object above the ocean caught my eye. totally black, i saw no lights under it or at tips end, only the row of lights from the far side of the inside edge of the maul shaped boomerang image. after i realized this was something to photograph, i went for the cellphone that was inside on charge. when i returned to the balcony, it began to turn its closest edge/tip to the west and the view went totally black. there seemed to be a very, very low roar/groan of a sound/feeling as it was in my field of view about 1/2 to 3/4 a mile out. this object was flying counterintuitively in that the maul inside edge was the direction it flew in, not point/curve forward. that was the distinguishing feature that made me know i had seen something odd.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Boomerang shape, windows/lights inside maul edge flying south, turned out to sea

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling south on u.S 83 around 10:00 p.M.   a very bright light appeared and followed me  for 2-3 miles.   it was about 5-10 feet behind me about 5 ft. high.   i went faster to get away from it. when i  approached a farm house, i braked quickly to pull into the yard and the light disappeared.  i went on home, shaking, and did not see it again.  because of the tag people received for telling such a story, i told only my parents.   then on christmas eve of that year the amarillo, tx. tv station reported such a story as told by some out-of-state people.   it happened to them the same as it did to me.   all of the law enforcement officers for 100 miles around fled to the scene but found nothing.   i still did not tell it around to people other than family.

i was a junior in college when this happened and am now a retired teacher.   i do not want to be classified as a nut case.   i just thought my story might be added to your list of unusual events in this area.   i saw nothing other than the very bright light that appeared and disappeared as quickly. 

my uncle was with me and he is now long deceased.
content.summary: A very bright light suddenly appeared car-highi behind me, followed me 2 or 3 miles, disappeared when i pulled into a house yard.
